prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Pavol has worked on scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society. He regularly gives lectures at conferences, participates in juries, and mentors in various competitions, both in the Czech Republic and internationally.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Pavol, scientific projects, Czech Ornithological Society, lectures, conferences, juries, mentors, competitions, Czech Republic, internationally
